title: Lunar Revel Pricing Messed Up - FIX NEEDED - Not Just Jinx
body:
As of the release of the Lunar Revel, the prices on the products in store are incorrect, the most apparent one to most  is probably the Firecraker Jinx Skin, which was meant to be discounted to 975 until February the 16th, but there is also the Bundles, for some reason, they seem to be not accounting for the fact that I have the champions in the Bundles, and are attempting to charge full price.

I hope you all at Riot fix this soon, as I cannot wait to buy all the skins that came out this Lunar Revel, and the rest of this patch (Valentines Day Skins).

Good luck to you, and keep up the good work :D

replies.body: Everything is fixed up now, sorry bout that, please take a look and let us know if you see anything else.

Happy to help, amazing response time btw.

Keep up the good work :)
Thanks for the report, we are looking into this now.
